title: LG's V40 ThinQ: a five-camera upgrade
description: The LG V40 ThinQ is a lot like every other high-end Android phone released this year, except for its new camera system. It has a total of five different cameras between the front and back, and they let you do some really interesting things that other phones just can't match.
